title: Problemas.
comment: Está bien aunque no es la mejor. Demora bastante en traducir, faltan idiomas y sus traducciones no son muy buenas, mayormente no tienen sentido. Espero que mejore.
There's no english-portuguese option. Please add it.

We try to offer as many language pairs as possible, but the translation engine and the pairs in Mitzuli are not developed by me (at the moment, they are mostly based on Apertium). Developing a new pair for a RBMT system like this requires months of work and the knowledge of the languages involved, and I cannot provide either of them in this case.
Awesome app, 10 stars for open source! Thanks for your work! Please, add English-Russian pair!
